DataElement.preferredName: Seizure Activity Per Education Document Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of patient seizure activity as described in the Education Sheet.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Seizure Activity Per Education Document Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._For each, generally denoting a ratio._The activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill._A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

Concepts.definition: A disorder characterized by a sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

Property.preferredDefinition: For each, generally denoting a ratio.:The activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill.:A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: For each, generally denoting a ratio.
The activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR Brain Tumor trial.dmr
